踑踑踑

踑字的基本解释

踑
jī
〔踑踞〕同“箕踞”，古人席地而坐时伸开两脚，其形如箕。这是一种不拘礼节的坐式，如“文颓然踑踑，傍若无人。”

踑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jī］
［《集韻》居之切，平之，見。］
见“踑踞”。

踑字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【足字部】　踑； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1227第18
〔古文〕䟚【廣韻】【集韻】?渠之切，音其。馴跡也。　又【集韻】居之切，音姬。【類篇】跡也。　又【集韻】巨几切，音跽。長踞也。與㠱同。【劉伶·酒德頌】奮髯踑踞。

踑字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
踑字的起名意思

暂无。

Poke
Basic explanation of words
Poke
jī
〔踑踞〕Same as "jizhe", the ancients stretched out their feet when sitting on the ground, and its shape was like a skip. This is a kind of informal sitting style, such as "The text is sullen and squatting, like no one is next to it."
Poke
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jī］
["Jiyun" Juzhi, Pingzhi, see. ]
See "Stayed".
Poke
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Foot Character Department] 　踑; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1227 Page 18
[Ancient text] Tong [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Qu Zhi cut, sound its. Tame traces also.　[Jiyun] Juzhiqi, Yinji. [Classes] Traces also.　[Jiyun] A few cuts, the sound is stubborn. Long standing too. Same as 㠱. 【Liu Ling·Song of Wine and Dessert】Fen-bearded and squatted.
